short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves the user interface when playing The Crew on boardgamearena.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds several user interface improvements when playing The Crew: The Quest for Planet Nine on boardgamearena.com:
• A discard pile to easily see which cards have already been played.

Supported boardgamearena languages:
• English
• French
